original_text: So Abram moved his tents. He went to live near the special oak trees of Mamre. That place is at Hebron. Abram built an altar to worship the Lord there.
korean_text: 이에 아브람이 장막을 옮겨 헤브론에 있는 마므레 상수리 수풀에 이르러 거주하며 거기서 여호와를 위하여 제단을 쌓았더라

sentences.original_text: He went to live near the special oak trees
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 특별한 참나무들 근처에 살러 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: Abram built an altar to worship the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 아브람은 주님을 경배하기 위해 제단을 쌓았습니다
